meanings.definition: Of or relating to the prostomium of an annelid worm.
meanings.sent1: The prostomial structure helps the annelid worm sense its environment.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the prostomial features of annelid worms to understand their biology better.
meanings.sent3: The prostomial area of the annelid worm is like its own little control center.
meanings.sent4: Her focus was as sharp as the prostomial senses of an annelid worm.
meanings.sent5: The prostomial characteristics of the annelid worm are crucial for its survival.

meanings.sent1: The prostomial annelid worm burrowed into the ground.
meanings.sent2: The prostomial features of the worm help it navigate its underground habitat.
meanings.sent3: The prostomial creature was a master at finding hidden treasures.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong as a prostomial annelid worm's instinct to burrow.
meanings.sent5: The prostomial adaptations of the worm make it well-suited for its environment.

meanings.definition: Located near or in front of the mouth.
meanings.sent1: The prostomial tentacles of the sea creature helped it catch prey.
meanings.sent2: The prostomial position of the sensory organs allows for efficient feeding.
meanings.sent3: The prostomial placement of the food bowl made it easy for the pet to eat.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as welcoming as a prostomial entrance to a grand feast.
meanings.sent5: The prostomial location of the mouth ensures quick access to food.
